name: Digs Mini Icy
description:
Digs Mini Icy is a mini adventure starring Warf. It incorporates mechanics similar to old classics like Sokoban, but with uniquely designed puzzles and added features. Warf is stuck in an icy mountain and must find his way while collecting gems and overcoming various obstacles like slippery grounds, dangerous lava, funky launchers and more. Only true masters can pass these challenges.

Digs: Icy is a mini game based on our original game, Digs, and features 50 levels. If you want to assist Warf further, you can wishlist Digs.
